#include<stdio.h>
long long fib(int a,int b,int n)
{
 long long f[n];
 
  int i;
  f[0] = a;
  f[1] = b;
 
  for (i = 2; i <= n; i++)
  {
      f[i] = f[i-1] + f[i-2];
  }
 
  return f[n-1];
}
 
int main ()
{
  int t,n,a,b;
  scanf("%d",&t);
 
  while(t--)
  {
  scanf("%d%d%d",&a,&b,&n);
  printf("%lld\n",fib(a,b,n));
  }
   return 0;
}
